K10sf280_sc:wal1_0: dakṣiṇasyāḥ paścimasyāḥ uttarasyān diśaḥ tṛṇolkāṁ upasaṁhareta na labheta agnir avatāraṁ
K10sf280_sc:wal1_1: na labheta ālambanam | .. .. .. yāvaṁ manaso ’pi dharmeṣu māra upasaṁkrāmati avatāraprekṣī
K10sf280_sc:wal1_2: avarāragaveṣī na labhate māra avatāraṁ pūrvavat |
K10sf280_sc:wal2_0: evaṁ vihārī bhikṣu rūpam abhibhūr bhavati no tu rūpair abhibhūyate | ṣabdāṁ gandhāṁ
K10sf280_sc:wal2_1: rasāṁ spraṣṭavyāṁ dharmāṁ abhibhūr bhavati no tu dharmair abhibhūyate | rūpābhibhūḥ
K10sf280_sc:wal2_2: śabdābhibhūḥ gandhābhibhūḥ rasābhibhūḥ spraṣṭavyābhibhūḥ dharmābhibhūḥ | abhibhūr
K10sf280_sc:wal2_3: anabhibhūr bhavati pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ sāṁkleśikaiḥ paunarbhavikaiḥ sajvarair
K10sf280_sc:wal3_0: saṁmukhaṁ me āyuṣmantaḥ bhagavato ’ntikāc chrutaḥ saṁmukham udgṛhītaḥ yo ’yam avasrutānavasruto dharmaparyāyaḥ avasrutānavasrutaṁ vo dharmaparyāyaṁ deśayiṣye iti . .. .. ..
K10sf280_sc:wal4_0: atha bhagavāṁ āyusmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya kathāparyavasānaṁ viditvā utthāya niṣīdati
K10sf280_sc:wal4_1: paryaṁkam ābhujya ṛjuṁ kāyaṁ praṇidhāya pratimukhaṁ smṛtim upasthāpya nivasya bhagavān
K10sf280_sc:wal4_2: āyuṣmantaṁ mahāmaudgalyāyanam āmantrayati | sādhu sādhu maudgalyāyana | sādhu khalu
K10sf280_sc:wal4_3: tvaṁ maudgalyāyana bhikṣūṇāṁ avasrutānavasrutaṁ dharmaparyāyaṁ deśayasi | punar api
K10sf280_sc:wal4_4: tvam abhīkṣṇam api bhikṣūṇām avasrutānavasrutaṁ dharmaparyāyaṁ deśaya | tad bhaviṣyati
K10sf280_sc:wal5_0: tatra bhagavāṁ bhikṣūn āmaṁtrayati | udgṛhīdhvaṁ bhikṣavaḥ avasrutānavasrutaṁ dharmaparyāyaṁ
K10sf280_sc:wal5_1: dhārayata grāhayata vācayata avasrutānavasrutaṁ dharmaparyāyam | tat kasmād dhetoḥ |
K10sf280_sc:wal5_2: ayaṁ dharmaparyāyaḥ hitopasaṁhitaḥ arthopasaṁhitaḥ śīlopasaṁhitaḥ brahmacaryopsaṁhitaḥ
K10sf280_sc:wal5_3: abhijñāyai saṁbodhaye nirvāṇāya saṁvartate yāvac ca satpuruṣeṇa pravrajitena śraddhayā
K10sf280_sc:wal5_4: avasrutānavasruto dharmaparyāya udgṛhya paryavāpya tathā tathā dhārayitavyo grāhayitavyo vācayitavyaḥ |
K10sf280_sc:wal6_0: atha bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhinandyānumodya bhagavato ’ntikāt prakrāntāḥ |
